channel.title: Metrolium
channel.description: Modern, Metro, Multipurpose, Responsive WordPress Theme

item.title: Home
item.dc:creator: Matt
item.content:encoded:
[gap height="30"] [row] [column width="six-tenth"][/column] [column width="four-tenth"]

Unlimited Color Combinations

Metrolium features dozens of customizable elements that can all be colored independently of each other which means that unlike other themes, you're not limited by 2 colours like primary and secondary but instead have complete control to produce a truly unique color combination making it your own. [/column] [/row] [gap height="30"] [band variation="alternative" backgroundimage="http://www.euged.com/demo/metrolium/wp-content/uploads/2013/04/band_1.jpg" paddingtop="75px" paddingbottom="50px" inset="yes"] [row verticallyalign="yes"] [column width="four-tenth"]

Responsive and Retina Ready

Metrolium is a responsive WordPress theme which means that it works beautifully on lots of resolutions and devices including smartphones, tablets, PCs and Mac. It also looks absolutely stunning with super crisp, hi-dpi, Retina Ready images. Your visitors will have an amazing experience, whatever they're browsing on. [/column] [column width="six-tenth"][/column] [/row] [band variation="default" paddingtop="75px" paddingbottom="50px"] [row verticallyalign="yes"] [column width="six-tenth"][/column] [column width="four-tenth"]

Get creative with real time preview

Metrolium features the impressive WordPress Customizer which allows you to customize the look and feel of your theme with a real time preview, no refreshes, no tab switching and no boring over engineered admin panel. Once you're happy with the result, click 'Save & Publish' to show the world your uniquely designed website. [/column] [/row] [band variation="alternative" backgroundimage="http://www.euged.com/demo/metrolium/wp-content/uploads/2013/04/band_2.jpg" paddingtop="75px" paddingbottom="50px" inset="yes"] [row verticallyalign="yes"] [column width="three-fifth" offset="one-fifth"]

600+ Google Web Fonts

Typography is a important aspect of any website and that's why we've integrated Google Web Fonts into Metrolium giving access to an ever expanding web font set, currently at over 600!

[gap height="20"]

[button link="http://www.google.co.uk" target="_blank"]Browse the library[/button]

[/column] [/row] [band variation="default" paddingtop="75px" paddingbottom="50px"] [row verticallyalign="yes"] [column width="six-tenth"]
[subrow linearise="no"] [subcolumn width="one-half"][box borderradius="5px" padding="30px 0 10px 0"][/box][/subcolumn] [subcolumn width="one-half"][box borderradius="5px" padding="30px 0 10px 0"][/box][/subcolumn] [/subrow] [subrow linearise="no"] [subcolumn width="one-third"][box borderradius="5px" padding="30px 0 10px 0"][/box][/subcolumn] [subcolumn width="one-third"][box borderradius="5px" padding="30px 0 10px 0"][/box][/subcolumn] [subcolumn width="one-third"][box borderradius="5px" padding="30px 0 10px 0"][/box][/subcolumn] [/subrow] [subrow linearise="no"] [subcolumn width="one-quarter"][box borderradius="5px" padding="30px 0 10px 0"][/box][/subcolumn] [subcolumn width="one-quarter"][box borderradius="5px" padding="30px 0 10px 0"][/box][/subcolumn] [subcolumn width="one-quarter"][box borderradius="5px" padding="30px 0 10px 0"][/box][/subcolumn] [subcolumn width="one-quarter"][box borderradius="5px" padding="30px 0 10px 0"][/box][/subcolumn] [/subrow] [subrow linearise="no"] [subcolumn width="two-third"][box borderradius="5px" padding="30px 0 10px 0"][/box][/subcolumn] [subcolumn width="one-third"][box borderradius="5px" padding="30px 0 10px 0"][/box][/subcolumn] [/subrow]
[/column] [column width="four-tenth"]

Create unique layouts quickly and easily

Metrolium's bespoke, robust responsive grid means that you can create unique layouts that work across all devices, quickly and easily. [button link="http://www.google.co.uk" target="_blank"]Find out how[/button] [/column] [/row]

Banding system & Columns

Seperate your content into different sections (bands) to bring emphasis and a creative flare to your content. Pick any background colour and even add a background image for even greater creative flexability. Choose from either light or dark variates depending on the background configuration you use. The light variation is configured to have a darker text colour pallete so is more suited for lighter background colours, whereas the dark variation includes white text and headings and is more suited to darker background colours. item.title: Shortcodes Reference Guide
item.dc:creator: Matt
item.content:encoded:
Accordion

[tabs] [tab title="Description"] Accordions are great for showing a lot of content in a small space. Each accordion panel can be expanded to reveal the content inside. Each accordion should have a title. [/tab] [tab title="Code"] [/tab] [tab title="Configuration"]
title
string of characters
[/tab] [/tabs]

Band

[tabs] [tab title="Description"] Bands are a great way to organise content into different sections (bands) and bring emphasis and a creative flare to it. Choose from the default or alternative variates, both of which are highly configurable from with the theme customizer. [/tab] [tab title="Code"] [/tab] [tab title="Configuration"]
variation
default, alternative
inset
yes, no
backgroundimage
URL to image resource
bordertop
shorthand css border value
borderbottom
shorthand css border value
paddingtop
value with units (e.g. 3px)
paddingbottom
value with units (e.g. 3px)
[/tab] [/tabs]

Blockquote

[tabs] [tab title="Description"] Create a page of client testimonials or display your favourite quote aswell as everything in between. Two styles to choose from, a simple blockquote or a testimonial. [/tab] [tab title="Code"] [blockquote type="testimonial" author="Richard Branson" role="Founder and Chairman"] *content* [/blockquote] [/tab] [tab title="Configuration"]
type
blockquote, testimonial
author
string of characters
role
string of characters
image
URL to image resource
[/tab] [/tabs]

Box

[tabs] [tab title="Description"] Great for bringing emphasis to a section of content. Choose any background colour, border colour and even make the box look inset into the page or outset on top of the page. [/tab] [tab title="Code"] [box backgroundcolour="#EEEEEE" style="inset"] *content* [/box] [/tab] [tab title="Configuration"]
backgroundcolour
hex colour
bordercolour
hex colour
style
inset, outset
borderradius
value with units (e.g. 3px)
[/tab] [/tabs]

Break

[tabs] [tab title="Description"] For adding line breaks in blocks of text to fine tune typographic layout and flow [/tab] [tab title="Code"] [br] [/tab] [tab title="Configuration"] 
none
[/tab] [/tabs]

Button

[tabs] [tab title="Description"] Hyperlink to any URL or resource online whilst picking from three preset colour ways, or provide a hex colour for compete control. You can easily link to internal WordPress resources simply by passing it the ID of the object. You can also link to any external resource by passing it the full URL. [/tab] [tab title="Code"] [button size="large" link="http://www.google.co.uk"] Visit Google [/button] [/tab] [tab title="Configuration"]
size
small, medium, large
colour
default, light, dark, hex colour
link
URL or Object ID
target
_blank, _self, _parent, _top
[/tab] [/tabs]

Callout

[tabs] [tab title="Description"] Entice your visitors to perform an action with the callout shortcode. [/tab] [tab title="Code"] [callout title="Buy one get one free" buttontext="Browse products" buttonlink="http://www.google.co.uk"] Buy one product and get another product of the same value or less for free [/callout] [/tab] [tab title="Configuration"]
title
string of characters
buttontext
buttonsize
small, medium, large
buttoncolor
hex colour
buttonlink
URL
buttontarget
_blank, _self, _parent, _top
[/tab] [/tabs]

Clear

[tabs] [tab title="Description"] Useful for fine tuning layouts. For a very technical and detailed explanation on what clearing means, view this page. [/tab] [tab title="Code"] [clear] [/tab] [tab title="Configuration"] 
none
[/tab] [/tabs]

Gap

[tabs] [tab title="Description"] Handy for fine tuning the horizontal space between page elements without adding any visual clutter. The default height is 10px tall, but this can be easily changed to provide a larger gap. [/tab] [tab title="Code"] [gap height="20"] [/tab] [tab title="Configuration"]
height
numerical value without units (e.g. 20)
[/tab] [/tabs]

Horizontal Rule

[tabs] [tab title="Description"] Great for organising content and pages into sections. Choose from three styles, a simple line, an elegant and subtle shadow effect or a line with an icon in the middle to add a more descriptive content divider. [/tab] [tab title="Code"] [hr style="icon" icon="star-empty"] [/tab] [tab title="Configuration"]
style
line, icon, shadow
icon
FontAwesome icon name (minus 'icon-' prefix) reference
[/tab] [/tabs]

Icon List

[tabs] [tab title="Description"] Very similar to the standard un-ordered and ordered lists you might be familiar with, but this list enables you to specify icons for each individual item. If no icon is specified it defaults to a tick. [/tab] [tab title="Code"] [icon_list] [item icon="glass"] *content* [/item] [item icon="music"] *content* [/item] [item icon="search"] *content* [/item] [/icon_list] [/tab] [tab title="Configuration"]
icon
FontAwesome icon name (minus 'icon-' prefix) reference
[/tab] [/tabs]

Lead

[tabs] [tab title="Description"] Highlight the start of a page or blog post the with lead shortcode. [/tab] [tab title="Code"] [lead] *content* [/lead] [/tab] [tab title="Configuration"] 
none
[/tab] [/tabs]

Notice

[tabs] [tab title="Description"] Have anything you want to be particulary visible to the customer? Perhaps they have just completed a form succesfully, or you performing some maintenance on the site and you want to let customers know. [/tab] [tab title="Code"] [notice type="warning"] *content* [/notice] [/tab] [tab title="Configuration"]
type
error, success, warning
[/tab] [/tabs]

Person

[tabs] [tab title="Description"] Great for constructing a team members page. All social links and emails are optional. [/tab] [tab title="Code"] [person name="Richard Branson" role="Founder and Chairman" email="richard@virgin.com" twitter="https://twitter.com/richardbranson" ] *content* [/person] [/tab] [tab title="Configuration"]
name
string of characters
role
string of characters
image
URL to image resource
link
URL
email
email address
twitter
full URL to Twitter profile
facebook
full URL to Facebook profile
linkedin
full URL to LinkedIn profile
[/tab] [/tabs]

Pullquote

[tabs] [tab title="Description"] Highlight a quote or short sentence from a page or blog post by pulling it either left or right within the page and adding some colour. The rest of the article wraps around the pullquote giving it a great look. [/tab] [tab title="Code"] [pullquote align="right"] *content* [/pullquote] [/tab] [tab title="Configuration"]
align
left, right
[/tab] [/tabs]

Row/Columns

[tabs] [tab title="Description"] Description and instructions [/tab] [tab title="Code"] [row] [column width="one-quarter"] *content* [/column] [column width="one-half"] [subrow] [subcolumn width="one-half"] *content* [/subcolumn] [subcolumn width="one-half"] *content* [/subcolumn] [/subrow] [/column] [column width="one-quarter"] *content* [/column] [/row] [/tab] [tab title="Configuration"]
width
one-quarter, three-eigtht, four-tenth, one-third, etc
offset
one-quarter, three-eigtht, four-tenth, one-third, etc
linearise
yes, no
[/tab] [/tabs]

Tabs

[tabs] [tab title="Description"] Tabs are great for showing a lot of content in a small space. Flick between tabs to reveal the underlying content. You can also add an optional icon to each tab. [/tab] [tab title="Code"] [tabs] [tab title="Music" icon="music"] *content* [/tab] [tab title="Biography"] *content* [/tab] [tab title="Contact Details"] *content* [/tab] [/tabs] [/tab] [tab title="Configuration"]
title
string of characters
icon
FontAwesome icon name (minus 'icon-' prefix) reference
[/tab] [/tabs]

Tag List

[tabs] [tab title="Description"] Description and instructions [/tab] [tab title="Code"] [tag_list] [tag] *content* [/tag] [tag] *content* [/tag] [tag] *content* [/tag] [/tag_list] [/tab] [tab title="Configuration"] [/tab] [/tabs]

Teaser

[tabs] [tab title="Description"] A teaser is a great way to construct a portal page that will help your visitors get to where they want to go faster, wheather its a list of your services, products or any other sub page. [/tab] [tab title="Code"] [teaser title="Services" link="http://www.google.co.uk"] *content* [/teaser] [/tab] [tab title="Configuration"]
title
string of characters
link
URL
image
URL to image resource
target
_blank, _self, _parent, _top
[/tab] [/tabs]

item.title: Features
item.dc:creator: David
item.content:encoded:
[row] [column width="one-quarter"]

Beautifully Designed

Metrolium has been meticulously designed to be a multipurpose, stunning WordPress theme, so customizable that no two websites using this theme need ever look the same. Mobile friendly (responsive) and Retina Ready, the theme will wow your visitors no matter what device they're browsing with. [/column] [column width="three-quarter"] [subrow] [subcolumn width="one-third"] [teaser boxed="no" title="Boxed & Wide Versions" link="735" image="http://www.euged.com/demo/metrolium/wp-content/uploads/2013/05/feature_thumb_boxedwide.png"] Boxed? Wide? Whichever you prefer, Metrolium has you covered and looks equally as stunning in either style. Click through and take a preview. [/teaser] [/subcolumn] [subcolumn width="one-third"] [teaser boxed="no" title="Responsive & Retina Ready" link="741" image="http://www.euged.com/demo/metrolium/wp-content/uploads/2013/05/feature_thumb_responsive.jpg"] Metrolium works beautifully on numerous devices and looks absolutely stunning with super crisp hi-dpi images making it perfect for Retina Ready devices. [/teaser] [/subcolumn] [subcolumn width="one-third"] [teaser boxed="no" title="6 Header Styles" link="734" image="http://www.euged.com/demo/metrolium/wp-content/uploads/2013/05/feature_thumb_headers.jpg"] A flexible header system allows for numerous header combinations. Mix and match the info bar with the navigation style of your choice and optionally add in a title bar with sub title and call to action. [/teaser] [/subcolumn] [/subrow] [subrow] [subcolumn width="one-third"] [teaser boxed="no" title="WP Customizer" link="729" image="http://www.euged.com/demo/metrolium/wp-content/uploads/2013/05/feature_thumb_customizer.jpg"] Welcome to real time editing of the look and feel thanks to WP Customizer. See your theme styles and colors update in a realtime preview before you publish your changes. [/teaser] [/subcolumn] [subcolumn width="one-third"] [teaser boxed="no" title="600+ Google Web Fonts" link="749" image="http://www.euged.com/demo/metrolium/wp-content/uploads/2013/05/feature_thumb_fonts.png"] Integrated Google Web Fonts gives you access to an ever expanding web font set, currently at over 600! [/teaser] [/subcolumn] [subcolumn width="one-third"] [teaser boxed="no" title="FontAwesome Icons" link="737" image="http://www.euged.com/demo/metrolium/wp-content/uploads/2013/05/feature_thumb_icons.png"] Packed with the incredibly diverse FontAwesome boasting more than 300 vectorised icons in a single web font giving you a huge collection of super sharp icons to use anywhere. [/teaser] [/subcolumn] [/subrow] [/column] [/row] [band variation="alternative" inset="yes"] [row] [column width="one-quarter"]

Bursting with Functionality

With realtime preview, more than a dozen page templates, dozens of shortcodes, custom widgets, a sortable portfolio, stunning blog, 2 sliders, translation ready and absolutely tons more features, we're not quite sure how we managed to pack it all in. [/column] [column width="three-quarter"] [subrow] [subcolumn width="one-third"] [teaser boxed="no" title="3 Sliders including Parallax LayerSlider & RevSlider" link="757" image="http://www.euged.com/demo/metrolium/wp-content/uploads/2013/06/feature_thumb_sliders.jpg"] Metrolium is packed with not one, not two but THREE sliders including the incredible parallax LayerSlider, parallax RevSlider and FlexSlider too. [/teaser] [/subcolumn] [subcolumn width="one-third"] [teaser boxed="no" title="jQuery Powered Sortable Portfolio" link="769" image="http://www.euged.com/demo/metrolium/wp-content/uploads/2013/06/feature_thumb_portfolio.jpg"] A sleek, sortable portfolio with 4 archive styles and 4 single styles, not to mention slider support too. [/teaser] [/subcolumn] [subcolumn width="one-third"] [teaser boxed="no" title="Stunning blog with 6 post formats" link="771" image="http://www.euged.com/demo/metrolium/wp-content/uploads/2013/06/feature_thumb_blog.png"] We've packed two blog styles into Metrolium; a tumblr style and magazine style, both of which support 6 post formats - image, gallery, video, quote, link and audio. item.title: Many Banner Styles
item.dc:creator: David
item.content:encoded:
We offer three initial unique banner styles, all with an optional info bar, bringing the total combinations up to 6. All these changes update in real time, so no more flicking back and forth between browser windows as you make changes, they all happen right before your eyes. Each banner style offers a unique look and feel, greatly changing the theme in an instant and opening up a whole array of creativepossibilities. You can change the colors to suite your brand, but to really create an impact, you can add your own background image fortrulyunlimited creative potential.

Version 1

A very popular style at the moment in web design. It features a logo aligned to the left and a navigation area aligned to the right. It allows for amoderatelysized navigation.

Version 2

This version moves the navigation into its own "band" situated below a full width banner. This header style lends itself well to sites that require a larger navigation. The additional space in the banner left by the navigation opens the doors to adding a creative background image within the banner.

Version 3

Similar to version 2, this features a full width navigation that can contain a larger amount of links than version 1. The header is much taller, with the addition of a background image on the header this would be the most visually effective header style.

Configuration

Here we illustrate how you can add the optional info bar to any of the previously mentioned header styles. You can also see the hello bar which is a temporary bar which appears at the very top of the page above any header or infobar.

wp:postmeta.wp:meta_value: Tons of features crammed into 1 theme

item.title: Boxed & Wide Versions
item.dc:creator: David
item.content:encoded:
[gap]

Preview BoxedPreview Wide

[gap] Pick from either a full width or boxed version. In the wide version, the bands span the full width of the browser window, and in the boxed version, the site sits centrally to the window on top of a customizable background image. Both look great, and with the addition of the customizable background image, it's another thing to add to the list of areas where you can flex your creativity.

wp:postmeta.wp:meta_value: Tons of features crammed into 1 theme

item.title: FontAwesome Icons
item.dc:creator: David
item.content:encoded: We have added support for the incredibly powerful and vast icon font library, FontAwesome. FontAwesome contains almost 250 finely crafted and beautiful icons, which we have already made use of around the theme as standard. You can checkout our reference guide to see the full list of supported icons, and how you can best make use of them on your site. [button link="#" link="_blank"]View Reference Guide[/button]

wp:postmeta.wp:meta_value: Tons of features crammed into 1 theme

item.title: Powerful Band System
item.dc:creator: David
item.content:encoded: The bandshortcode we have developed in Metrolium is a great tool to help you add a creative flare to your Metrolium based website. It allows you to create unique sections on a page (only usable on pages without sidebars unfortunatly). To see an example of the band's in action, take a look at this page.

wp:postmeta.wp:meta_value: Tons of features crammed into 1 theme

item.title: Responsive & Retina Ready
item.dc:creator: David
item.content:encoded: [gap height="20"] Metrolium is a fully responsive theme. Built from the ground up to be suitable for mobile devices, tablets, laptops and large desktop computers. It will not only look fantastic on mobile and tablet devices but will be fully functional too, giving your Metrolium based website a much greater audience, whilst giving them a tailored experience that wont leave them frustrated. A large chunk of mobile devices and tablets on the market now have HiDPI screens. Metrolium looks fantastic on all the HiDPI devices. Text, images and icons look crisp.

wp:postmeta.wp:meta_value: Tons of features crammed into 1 theme

item.title: Layer Slider
item.dc:creator: David
item.content:encoded:
[layerslider id="14"] [gap height="30"] [row] [column] [icon_list] [item]Layers can slide, fade, rotate and scale.[/item] [item]3 types of navigation with thumbnails.[/item] [item]12 skins included with skin style editor.[/item] [item]Can be used with any HTML content.[/item] [item]Auto-plays YouTube and Vimeo videos.[/item] [/icon_list] [/column] [column] [icon_list] [item]Visual transition builder & transition gallery.[/item] [item]WYSIWYG slider editor with real-time preview.[/item] [item]Hardware accelerated CSS3 and jQuery transitions.[/item] [item]Localization & Multisite ready.[/item] [/icon_list] [/column] [/row] [hr style="shadow"] We have included the premium slider plugin LayerSlider for FREE within the theme. LayerSliderallows you to create beautiful sliders with a wide variety of animations and effects. Taken from the official LayerSliderpage: [box]
This is the WordPress plugin of LayerSlider! You can create as many layers and sublayers as you want. You can use unlimited images with links. The script is very user-friendly, you can add global settings or local (per slide) settings to each layer or sublayer. You can change delay times, easing types, durations and much more.
[/box] You can find out more about LayerSliderhere.

wp:postmeta.wp:meta_value: Tons of features crammed into 1 theme

item.title: Revolution Slider
item.dc:creator: David
item.content:encoded:
[gap height="30"] We have included the premium slider plugin Slider Revolution for FREE within the theme. Slider Revolution allows you to create beautiful sliders with a wide variety of animations and effects. Taken from the official Slider Revolution page: [box]
Create a responsive(mobile friendly) or fullwidth slider with must-see-effects and meanwhile keep or build your SEO optimization (all content always readable for search engines). See the heaps of custom transitions/animations for each object on the page! Customize this slider with our convenient drag&drop backend to your very needs. This plugin features tons of unique transition effects, an image preloader, video embedding, autoplay that stops on user interaction and lots of easy to set options to create your own effects.
[/box] You can find out more about Slider Revolution here.

wp:postmeta.wp:meta_value: Tons of features crammed into 1 theme

item.title: 600+ Google Web Fonts
item.dc:creator: David
item.content:encoded: [gap height="30"] We leverage the extreamly vast and powerful Google Web Fonts library to offer you control over the typography within the theme. As of writing this, the Google Web Fonts library contains over 600 fonts to choose from! No technical knowledge is required to change fonts, they are all hosted and delivered by Google using a very powerful content delivery network. All this allows you to pick and choose from all 600+ fonts with no need to ever upload any files or write lines of code. The library of fonts is constantly growing, if you want to check out the entire up to the minute library, you can head over the library and have a browse. [button link="http://www.google.com/fonts/" target="_blank"]Google Web Fonts[/button]

item.title: Free Updates & Support
item.dc:creator: David
item.content:encoded: [gap height="30"] [gap height="30"] On top of our fantastic documentation, we also offer free support via our forums for any of the more technical questions you may have. [notice type="warning"]*All this support is completely free of charge*.[/notice] Over time the theme will receive several updates, we will be adding new features and functionality, and keeping up with any updates WordPress should make that impacts the theme in any way. By purchasing this theme, you will receive all future updates free of charge. Furthermore, if you have integrated your Envato marketplace details within the theme, the updates will be served directly to you for you to install when you see fit.

wp:postmeta.wp:meta_value: Tons of features crammed into 1 theme

item.title: Unlimited Colors
item.dc:creator: David
item.content:encoded: Our powerful customization options allow you to add your own unique creative flare to the theme, changing almost every aspect of the color scheme, all in real time! It looks and feels fantastic to see your website evolve and grow right before your eyes. For the more experienced web designer or developer, you can add your own CSS directly within the admin panel, which takesprecedenceover all pre-defined styles, allowing youtrulyunlimited scope for creativity and control.

wp:postmeta.wp:meta_value: Tons of features crammed into 1 theme

item.title: Translation Ready
item.dc:creator: David
item.content:encoded: [gap height="20"] Metrolium is translation ready and will be speaking your language in no time.We have taken the time to ensure that each and every word within Metrolium is translatable. WordPress and WordPress Themes use theGNU gettextlocalization framework to provide localization infrastructure to WordPress. gettext is a mature, widely used framework for modular translation of software, and is thede factostandard for localization in the open source/free software realm. We recommend usingPoeditto translate Metrolium.

wp:postmeta.wp:meta_value: Tons of features crammed into 1 theme

item.title: Unlimited Sidebars
item.dc:creator: David
item.content:encoded: Some themes come packaged with pre-defined sidebars that don't leave you much room for expansion or growth. With Metrolium you can add an unlimited number of sidebars allowing you much greater flexibility and power with your widgets. On top of that, you can add any of your sidebars to your pages, picking whether to place it on the left or right of the page. This ability to easily create new sidebars and switch them around in an instant gives you great flexibility.

wp:postmeta.wp:meta_value: Tons of features crammed into 1 theme

item.title: Advanced Page Options
item.dc:creator: David
item.content:encoded: [gap height="20"] With powerful WordPress themes such as Metrolium, there is usually a complex admin panel that contains many options to configure and tweak. Whilst Metrolium does have an admin panel, it's purposefully been kept light, meaning you wont have to spend hours switching between tabs as you tweak options within a complex admin panel.

wp:postmeta.wp:meta_value: Tons of features crammed into 1 theme

item.title: Fully Documented
item.dc:creator: David
item.content:encoded: [gap height="30"] Picking up any new theme can feel a little daunting at first, so many new options, admin pages and new short codes to learn. That's why we have invested a lot of time documenting all these new features to ease the process of getting your new theme up, running and configured. We have packaged up the documentation within the .ZIP file, but it is also available online so you can always have access too it if you are working on your site in various locations. Within the documentation is a shortcode reference guide that explains what all the new shortcodes do, how you can configure them, example usage and we also include several layout blocks so you can simply copy and paste into your pages to give you a great starting point to flesh out your sites content. [button link="http://www.euged.com/documentation/metrolium/" target="_blank"]View Documentation[/button]

item.content:encoded: When you purchase a copy of this theme, you alsoreceivethe original artwork we made when designing the theme. This isparticularlyuseful if you plan on doing any extensive modifications to the theme to better suit your needs. It will help you to keep any new elements lookingconsistentwith the general look and feel of the theme.

item.title: Sortable Portfolio
item.dc:creator: David
item.content:encoded:
Display your work, projects or even clients using the Portfolio post type. You can then choose to display them in one of five ways, single column list or a grid pattern ranging from 2 to 5 columns. The archive page includes a powerful and interactive filter system allowing users to select various categories and see the items reveal and hide t
On each individual project you can choose to display it in either a full wide template, with a large header slider, or a narrower template which also includes a slider, but not as big. You can also display portfolio items throughout your Metrolium based site using the portfolio shortcode.

wp:postmeta.wp:meta_value: Tons of features crammed into 1 theme

item.title: Blog With 6 Post Formats
item.dc:creator: David
item.content:encoded: Blogging is a core feature of WordPress, it's where its roots lay. Whilst WordPress has evolved into something far beyond its original goal, the blog still remains, and we have not forgotten about it either. We offer support for many various post formats (a feature introduced in 3.1), along with the staple functionality such as comments, tags, categories and author details. The various post formats will really make your blog shine. We have made unique templates for each one, the end result is a blog that can become so much more than words and headings, it can be a visually attractive and interactive experience for your readers.

wp:postmeta.wp:meta_value: Tons of features crammed into 1 theme

item.title: SCSS Powered
item.dc:creator: David
item.content:encoded:
We have built the theme using SCSS. The .scss files are included within the theme package, so should you want or need to make any changes to the theme, we strongly suggest you make use of SCSS to do so. [hr]
SCSS is a meta-language on top of CSS thats used to describe the style of a document cleanly and structurally, with more power than flat CSS allows. SCSS both provides a simpler, more elegant syntax for CSS and implements various features that are useful for creating manageable stylesheets.
[hr] You can find out more about SCSS here.

wp:postmeta.wp:meta_value: Tons of features crammed into 1 theme

item.title: Custom Widgets
item.dc:creator: David
item.content:encoded: [gap height="20"] We have developed several custom widgets to sit along side the standard WordPress widgets. Widgets such as the Twitter Stream widget which allows you to display the latest tweets from any given twitter username.We have also made two widgets that make it easier for your readers to browse the blog. Finally we have added a Social Network widget, making it easier for you to promote your various social networks and other online presences. We currently support 17 of the most popular sites, and that number will surely grow over time.

wp:postmeta.wp:meta_value: Tons of features crammed into 1 theme

item.title: Hello Bar
item.dc:creator: David
item.content:encoded: [gap] HelloBar's are great conversion tools. Usually an eye catching bar that is displayed at the very top of a website in order to tempt the visitor to perform an action. Metrolium has one built right in! You can configure the HelloBar to look as eye catching as you wish. Whether you wish to use the HelloBar to simply inform users of important updates or tempt the user to perform an action, the HelloBar will never get in the way of the users experience. Once the HelloBar is hidden, it won't be displayed again to the user. Once the message in the HelloBar is changed, it will then be re-displayed to all visitors.

item.title: Shortcode Page Templates
item.dc:creator: Matt
item.content:encoded: [gap height="20"] If you have used WordPress before, you will probably be familiar with page templates, enabling you to differentiate pages from one another by giving it a new look or style. Having a lot of templates gives you a lot of options to choose from when making a new page. Page templates however are still quite restrictive, they never really give you that true control over each aspect of the page. In Metrolium we have done away with page templates all together, and instead built a large catalogue of easy to use shortcodes that will truely give you the power to create unique pages. Some shortcodes by themselves are more impressive than others, but its when they are combined together do they really shine. You can find a selection of shortcode page templates from this demo that you can simply copy and paste into your Metrolium based site over in the online documentation.

item.title: Site wide CTA Bar
item.dc:creator: Matt
item.content:encoded: [gap] We have added an optional global call to action bar which you can use to help increase user conversions. Like most other aspects of Metrolium, the bars colour pallete is customizable so you can make it as eye catching as you wish. A simple switch turns it on or off globally, really useful for timed promotions or offers.

item.title: Homepage 4 (Corporate)
item.dc:creator: Matt
item.content:encoded:
[row] [column width="one-quarter"]

Responsive

Metrolium has responsive design which means that it works beautifully across smartphones, tablets and desktop.

[/column] [column width="one-quarter"]

Retina Ready

Metrolium is Retina Ready which makes your website look even more beautiful on supporting devices with 2.2x detail.

[/column] [column width="one-quarter"]

Awesome Sliders

Not one, not two, but THREE awesome sliders are packed into Metrolium, including 2 premium parallax sliders worth $30!

[/column] [column width="one-quarter"]

Tons of Options

And if you thought that was it, you'd be wrong. We've packed tons of features into Metrolium, it's almost unbelievable!

item.title: Homepage 7 (Landing)
item.dc:creator: Matt
item.content:encoded:
[gap height="80"] [row] [column width="two-third" offset="one-sixth"]

Coming Soon

in 2013

[hr] Metrolium comes with a landing page design, perfect for gauging interest for a product or service you're considering creating or for collecting emails of users that want to be notified when you launch your awesome new product or service. In fact, it could be used for all sorts of reasons. [gap height="30"]

[/column] [/row] [gap height="100"]
